mapper.sql: fid, fmaid, fgoodseatid, fstockid, fqty, fdate, fmdate, fgperiod
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from T_VS_Inventory
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_VS_Inventory (fid, fmaid, fgoodseatid, fstockid, fqty, fdate, fmdate, fgperiod) values (#{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fmaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fgoodseatid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fstockid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fqty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fmdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fgperiod,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
